channel.title: kubestash-operator on RBAC ATLAS

item.title: kubestash-operator
item.description:
Description

KubeStash, Kubernetes native backup operator by AppsCode

  • https://github.com/stashed

Overview

Identity Namespace Automount Secrets Permissions Workloads Risk
kubestash-operator default âŒ â€” 42 2 Critical
kubestash-operator-cleaner default âŒ â€” 6 1 High

Numbers in the last two columns indicate how many bindings or workloads involve each ServiceAccount.

Identities

ðŸ”‘ Permissions (42)

Role Resource Verbs Risk Tags
